definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
Jiaohe county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
Jiaohe county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
lit. to kill the tiger and behead the scaly dragon

sentences.english: She hurriedly set GuQing calls his team not to save HeiMu Jiao down the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 她连忙集合队伍不顾青叔的劝阻要下山救黑木蛟。

sentences.english: Compare with endless endless black Jiao, he is our biggest threat.
sentences.chinese: 跟无穷无尽的黑蛟相比，他才是我们最大的威胁。

definition: wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
